name: VFOX
description: VFOX is the rewards-based cryptocurrency for a fully immersive discovery shopping and retail experience that combines gaming elements and forms its own standalone meta-verse, called the RFOX VALT. RFOX VALT will incorporate VR/AR and AI in addition to offering digital items, including those issued through blockchain smart contracts and NFTs. RFOX VALT is a venture of Southeast Asian venture and ecosystem builder RedFOX Labs.
